Title: Lego Microgame Too Many Enemies

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

  Game Overview: Brief This game is a very basic and fun 3D adventure game where you look around the map trying to find the end while killing different enemies along the way. 

  Instructions: D Use WASD or arrow keys to move your way around the map trying to get to a spot on the map.

Game Design Team Spencer McGeachie - Game Designer
